array.string: You can choose a background image from the available images or from your photo library. You can even use the camera to take a photo for the background!

dict.string:
### What a beautiful scene!
Notice that the background image obscures the background color. However, if you choose an image that has some transparent or see-through parts, like **Blu**, the background color shows through the transparent parts of the image. Keep this in mind when choosing a background for your scene.
